name: Fists of Magic (R_Goulart)
description:
Game made for MAGICAL GIRL GAME JAM #5. 

I only had a weekend to do everything, so the result is just a prototype, but I hope you enjoy it. Follow to see updates.

Obs.: The original version for the jam is for donwload in "Fists of Magic_Alpha_Win".

CONTROLS

KEYBOARD:

  • MOVE: W, A, S, D
  • ATTACK: Space
  • SPECIAL: N
  • DASH: M

JOYSTICK (XBOX BUTTONS POSITIONS):

  • MOVE: D-Pad or Left Stick
  • ATTACK: X
  • SPECIAL: Y
  • DASH: A

Game by Róger Goulart (Instagram: @roger_goulart)
